overview: The purpose and intent of this measure is to appropriate moneys for the Judiciary for fiscal years 2025-2026 and 2026-2027. [12] Your Committee has amended this measure by clarifying operating and capital improvement project amounts. [12] The effective date has been changed to July 1, 2050, to facilitate further discussion on the measure. [12]
appropriations: This measure, as amended, makes the following appropriations for operating expenses from general funds: $198,782,736 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2025-2026 and $198,855,327 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2026-2027. [12] For Capital Improvements in Fiscal Year 2025-2026, the appropriation from general obligation bond funds is $12,900,000 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt). [12] The sum total of the general obligation bonds so issued shall not exceed $12,900,000 (HB400_SD2_.HTM.txt). [11]
assumptions_and_methodology: Your Committee has amended this measure by clarifying operating and capital improvement project amounts. [12] Your Committee finds that this measure, as amended, provides sufficient funding for the Judiciary for the approaching fiscal biennium. [12]
agency_impact: The operating budget for JUD601 - Administration is appropriated from general funds at $36,657,483 for FY 2025-2026 and $36,506,593 for FY 2026-2027. [11] The sum of $12,900,000 (HB400_SD2_.HTM.txt) is appropriated for investment capital for administration. [11] The judiciary may delegate to other state or county agencies the planning, acquisition of land, design, construction, and equipment of any capital improvement project when it is determined by the judiciary to be advantageous to do so. [11]
policy_impact: Your Committee has amended this measure by changing the effective date to July 1, 2050, to facilitate further discussion on the measure. [12] The measure also involves making technical, nonsubstantive amendments for the purposes of clarity, consistency, and style. [12]
revenue_sources: As amended, general funds for operating expenses are appropriated at $198,782,736 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2025-2026 and $198,855,327 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2026-2027. [12] For Capital Improvements, general obligation bond funds are appropriated at $12,900,000 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2025-2026. [12] General obligation bonds may be issued, as provided by law, to yield the amount that may be necessary to finance projects authorized in part II and listed in part IV of this Act. [11]
six_year_fiscal_implications: This measure appropriates funds for the fiscal biennium beginning July 1, 2025, and ending June 30, 2027. [11] As amended, the operating budget from general funds is $198,782,736 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2025-2026 and $198,855,327 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2026-2027. [12] From all means of financing, the operating budget is $211,628,489 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2025-2026 and $211,701,080 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for Fiscal Year 2026-2027. [12] For capital improvements, $12,900,000 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) is appropriated from general obligation bond funds for Fiscal Year 2025-2026. [12] All appropriations made for fiscal year 2025-2026 and fiscal year 2026-2027 that are unencumbered as of June 30, 2028, shall lapse as of that date. [11]
capital_expenditure_impact: The sum of $12,900,000 (HB400_SD2_.HTM.txt) appropriated or authorized in part II of this Act for capital improvement projects shall be expended by the judiciary. [11] Projects include the Kauai Judiciary Complex Chiller Replacement, Lump Sum CIP for Judiciary Facilities, and plans and design for a new South Kohala District Courthouse. [11] [11] The chief justice may make supplemental allotments from the judiciary project adjustment fund if the amount allocated from the general obligation bond fund for a capital improvement project is insufficient. [11]
updates_from_previous_fiscal_note: Operating and capital improvement project amounts have been clarified, with general fund operating appropriations set to $198,782,736 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026 and $198,855,327 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for FY 2026-2027. [12] The appropriation for capital improvements from general obligation bond funds has been increased to $12,900,000 (HB400_SD2_SSCR1841_.htm.txt) for fiscal year 2025-2026. [12] The effective date of the measure has been changed to July 1, 2050. [12]
